name: Wormhole (farky)
description:
Wormhole is a precision platformer where you play as a stranded astronaut trying to get back to their ship. Players dash and jump to different platformers moving from left to right after completing the short tutorial.  With simple mechanics, players must traverse through different terrains dealing with the different obstacles in their way. Try and get to the end as fast as you can!

Controls: 

Hold - 'A/D' and  '' to dash around

Press - 'Space' to jump

Let go of the dash and jump at the same time to get around quickly!

Please fill out the form below!

https://forms.gle/RipTdx8qyitMCrZh8

Download one of the files and get started

Thanks!
